sample_docs: BUILD ENGAGEMENT THAT MAKES A DIFFERENCE Employee engagement matters – to your organizational health and business success. Nurturing engagement isn't just about recognition. It requires more than open communication. And transparency alone won't do it. The Achievers Employee Engagement Platform is uniquely designed to approach engagement holistically. It enables you to: Regularly recognize and reward employees for their contributions. Understand what employees need to be even more successful. Help employees do great things every day. EXPLORE PLATFORM BUILD ENGAGEMENT THAT MAKES A DIFFERENCE Employee engagement matters – to your organizational health and business success. Nurturing engagement isn't just about recognition. It requires more than open communication. And transparency alone won't do it. The Achievers Employee Engagement Platform is uniquely designed to approach engagement holistically. It enables you to: Regularly recognize and reward employees for their contributions. Understand what employees need to be even more successful. Help employees do great things every day. ENGAGEMENT PERFORMANCE RETENTION PRODUCTIVITY DRIVE POSITIVE RESULTS The numbers speak for themselves. Our platform can help you see significantly improved results in the areas that most impact business success. ACHIEVERS OTHERS ENGAGEMENT 96 % 52% PERFORMANCE 85 % 53% RETENTION 88 % 56% PRODUCTIVITY 82 % 52% Brandon Hall Group, "Improving Business Results Through Social Recognition", 2015. The numbers speak for themselves. Our platform can help you see significantly improved results in the areas that most impact business success. Brandon Hall Group, "Improving Business Results Through Social Recognition", 2015. HOW DISCOVER ENHANCED ITS CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH ACHIEVERS The Achievers Employee Engagement Platform created the infrastructure to foster a sense of unity and culture of respect among Discover's 16,000+ employees worldwide. Both employees and the customers they serve benefit as a result. If you are reading this, it is because your browser does not support the HTML5 video element. Our solutions The tools you need to shape your workforce Explore our platform Employee recognition made easy A truly global rewards marketplace Nomination- based awards Years of service & milestones Flexible reporting & AI-powered insights Why it works Recognition made simple. Results made real. Online and offline recognition Recognition is easy – whether you're on the frontline, field-based, or at a desk. Access our user-friendly platform on web, mobile, or tablet. Integrated in your flow of work Let recognition happen naturally, wherever you work. Recognize directly from your everyday productivity apps and the HRIS systems you already use. The industry's highest-used platform When recognition is easy, employees recognize more. That's why Achievers has the highest adoption rate, driving engagement, productivity, and retention. Customer results Recognition that shapes performance Our customers see up to 5x improvement on key business drivers like engagement, productivity, and retention. Aligning a diverse workforce across 26 countries Increasing sales and customer satisfaction 250% Return on Recognition 91% Overall employee engagement Achievers has impacted engagement at ATB by giving our team members a platform to share their voice and seek and share feedback amongst each other, to come together as one ATB in a visual way. Kerilee Snatenchuk Director, People & Culture 250% Return on investment Achievers has really helped us to engage and retain associates... leveraging the mobile site and the app to ensure that we can reach them on-the-go in the flow of work. Jacob Norman System Director of Talent, Insights and Strategy Aligning a diverse workforce across 26 countries Increasing sales and customer satisfaction 250% Return on Recognition 91% Overall employee engagement ❝ Achievers has impacted engagement at ATB by giving our team members a platform to share their voice and seek and share feedback amongst each other, to come together as one ATB in a visual way. Kerilee Snatenchuk Director, People & Culture 250% Return on investment ❝ Achievers has really helped us to engage and retain associates... leveraging the mobile site and the app to ensure that we can reach them on-the-go in the flow of work. Jacob Norman System Director of Talent, Insights and Strategy Seamless integration with your tools We're a trusted Workday partner and integrate with top HCM platforms. 70% of new customers chose our employee recognition software for our powerful integrations. Comprehensive success and support model Get 24/7 global support across all devices in 200+ languages, plus ongoing guidance with expert insights designed to drive usage and results. Proven global excellence Scale your employee recognition program with a localized, multilingual software supporting 4+ million members worldwide and local fulfillment in ~190 countries. Flexible reporting & AI-driven insights Tap into near real-time data to track engagement, uncover behavioral insights, and monitor employee sentiment – all in one centralized, self-serve dashboard. See why we're different Thought leadership Recognition backed by science – not guesses Personalized demo Start shaping your culture today See why companies choose Achievers to build a more engaged workforce.
